fullplot: A brief look into Romany culture and Rom (Gypsies) from around the globe as five famous Romany groups tour the USA.
plot: A brief look into Romani culture and Rom (Gypsies) from around the globe as five famous Romani groups tour the USA. The film visits their families at home in Spain, India, Macedonia and Romania.
title: When the Road Bends... Tales of a Gypsy Caravan

tomatoes.consensus: A dynamic doc following five Romani bands is a pleasure for the senses thanks to vibrant colors and eclectic music.
